content.text: Apply for a place at The Oratory Prep School

image.alt: Adult with child looking at laptop

content.text: The Oratory Prep School is a co-educational preparatory day and boarding school for pupils aged 2 to 13 years in Oxfordshire. Set within 65 acres of countryside with outstanding facilities, the school nurtures happy, balanced and inquisitive children. Around 20% of boys move on to The Oratory School at 13, taking Common Entrance. However, OPS boys may instead choose to enter other top schools.
Bright World's placement service is FREE. If you would like more information on and how to apply for a place at The Oratory Prep School then contact us now.
